data.title: The Joy of My Heart
data.meta_description: Subtitled, "Meditating Daily on God's Word." If you've been encouraged over the years by the way Anne's writing applies scriptural truth to everyday life, you'll be blessed each day through reading The Joy of My Heart ...
data.text:
PRODUCT ID: 233

Original Edition | Subtitled, “Meditating Daily on God’s Word.”

If you’ve been encouraged over the years by the way Anne’s writing applies scriptural truth to everyday life, you’ll be blessed each day through reading The Joy of My Heart. In this collection of daily devotions, Anne brings some of her most thought-provoking meditations from six of her best-selling books into concise and captivating readings for each day of the year. Whether you make it an inspiring addition to your personal devotional time or a gift to encourage a friend or family member, we pray it will draw each one who reads it closer to Jesus, rediscovering that His Word is the “the joy of my heart.”

**Please Note: Fulfillment and delivery of orders may be delayed due to current conditions and restrictions. Thank you for your patience!

Save
